/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, providing a canopy of shade over the sidewalk. Power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that stand tall in the background. These buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, add a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the tranquility of the scene. This is a snapshot of life in Beijing, where nature and urban development coexist harmoniously.
